data.title: Kenya: Land Offices in Awasi Razed By Fierce Inferno
data.location: [Capital FM] Kisumu -- Land offices at Awasi, Nyando Sub County went up in flames on Saturday evening.

data.title: Multiple fire departments respond to two fires in Stougton
data.location: Crews were battling a fire on Wheeler Circle and at a home on Central Street, where a fourth alarm was struck, the Stoughton Fire Department said in a social media post late Saturday afternoon.

data.title: At least 6 injured in predawn fire at Maryland highrise
data.location: At least six people were injured -- one critically -- during a fire early Saturday that left some residents trapped on balconies of a highrise apartment building in Silver Spring, Maryland, a fire official says.

data.title: JUST IN: Property razed as tanker bursts into flames in Ondo
data.location: Property worth millions of naira were burnt down in Idanre community in Idanre Local Government Area of Ondo State on Saturday evening, when a tanker carrying petrol fell and caught fire. It was gathered that the fire razed down the filling station and a buil…

data.title: Plymouth man dies in fire caused by ‘smoking materials,’ officials say
data.location: The state Fire Marshal is urging people who smoke to “be sure to put it out, all the way, every time” after William J. Price, 79, died in a Plymouth house fire started by “smoking materials” last week.

data.title: Sheriff: Gunman fatally shot, 2 wounded near barn fire
data.location: A Florida sheriff’s deputy fatally shot an armed man who had wounded two people and set a barn on fire before barricading himself inside a house
